title: what does ah or ahh suggest to you?
content:
Hi im studying graphics n i have a strange question!!! n i am woundering what does Ah or Ahh suggest? does it relate to relaxation/relief or is it surprise or something else? What do you think?

 [‹ Reasons to use Flickr ?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203230818/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41084 "Go to previous forum topic") [woody allen's favorite typeface ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203230818/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41624 "Go to next forum topic")
author: wt418750

comments.content: Batman fighting crime is what comes to my mind.

“Ahh”: yes, relaxation/relief, “Ah”: a sudden thought or change of mind, about to be elaborated upon. ?

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
Ever since I chose to block pop-ups, my toaster’s stopped working.

It could also be, “now I understand!”

ChrisL

Flash - a-ah - saviour of the universe  
Flash - a-ah - he’ll save everyone of us  
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha  
Flash - a-ah - he’s a miracle  
Flash - a-ah - king of the impossible

Ahh - revelation, realization

Ah - pause, boredom, dismissiveness

Ah – “Now I get it!”  
Ahh – “Crap, I have strep!”

dtw - are you trying to summon Hrant?  
There is another thread for that.

LOL

Humor guys - just humor.

P.S. Wasn’t it Sherlock Holmes who coined “ah-ha” as he called for Watson?

I thought he coined the phrase “What’s up Doc” instead :-)

ChrisL
Sii. I now that guys cousin! His son is a dear friend of mine.
Cool, that was a random screen grab - 1985 seems like yesterday.

May not mean anything to non-Brits: “Ahhh, Bisto!”

(Long running gravy-powder advertising slogan)

well i seem to have become addicted you could say to writting too many “h” on ahh.. as a surprise eliment i seem to always write.. liek this many “h” AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH madness i know!!!

whats the project your going to be doing, sounds like an interesting one!!!!

TYPOGRAPHY !!!!!!!!!!!  
Mark Webber ISTD
